oneOf.description: A class representing a file in the inference.sh ecosystem.
oneOf.title: File

description: Input schema for Flux 2 Turbo image generation.

prompt.description: The text prompt to generate an image from.
examples: A realistic photograph of a vintage typewriter with a sheet of paper inserted that says 'Chapter One: The Journey Begins,' sunlight falling across the desk.
prompt.title: Prompt

height.description: The height in pixels of the generated image.
height.title: Height

width.description: The width in pixels of the generated image.
width.title: Width

reference_images.description: List of reference images to use for editing. When provided, uses image-to-image mode. Maximum 4 images.
reference_images.title: Reference Images

guidance_scale.description: Guidance scale - how closely the model follows the prompt. Lower values give more creative freedom.
guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale

seed.description: The seed for random generation. If not provided, a random seed will be used.
seed.title: Seed

num_images.description: The number of images to generate.
num_images.title: Num Images

enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt will be expanded for better results.
enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.

title: AppInput
